subject: Can't be a lover anymore?
body:
Dear customer.
Do you shop for drugs on the Web regularly? If yes, read this letter to the end since it contains the information you will definitely find useful.
"High price proves the high quality of the drug" That's what all Web pharmacies say in their ads. All except CanadianPharmacy. Drug sales tax is much lower here in Canada so we don't have any trouble dumping our rivals into tears. CanadianPharmacy generic quality CAN be cheap.
CanadianPharmacy the best that modern medicine can offer you, plus the best Canadian prices.
Best regards,Harriet Blevins
